name: Legend's World
storyline:
Many years ago in distant lands, the secrets of the incidents, which gave rise the appearance of strange creatures and the changing of the world into a world of fantasies and adventures, were guarded by The Ancients and this marks the beginning of the First Era. Over the years, the creatures have become more dangerous, the adventures have become very risky and the changes in the world occurred in a bad way.
Today, twenty-one years later, the last ancient decided to challenge and confront the world and its challenges with the help of the last heroes.
summary:
Legend's World takes place at the same time as the The Adventures of a Legend. Now they have a limited time, the superior forces decided to launch new challenges... Survival is at stake.
